title: Deals: Anker Android projector sale, Sony XM3 ANC earbuds hit $118, more
content:
Kicking off all of today’s deals, Anker has a home theater sale with Android projectors and streamers from $50. That’s alongside a new low on Sony’s popular XM3 ANC earbuds at $118 and the first discount on Garmin’s all-new Instinct S2 Solar smartwatch. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Anker Android projector sale, Sony XM3 ANC earbuds hit $118, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Anker Android projector and streamer sale has kicked off at Amazon for 1-day only starting from $50, plus Sony ANC buds and more.
